Events.RelatedDescription: Opened issue "Proposal: Link should provide an API to get info about its current state" (#2066) at vuejs/vue-router
Events.RelatedBody:
### What problem does this feature solve?
With info about Links active state you can trigger animations or something else.

Please see this issue from someone else:
https://github.com/vuejs/vue-router/issues/774
https://forum.vuejs.org/t/get-active-state-of-router-link-using-javascript/1462
and his gist: https://gist.github.com/aplr/b49b74103a5c4adba57379cc7ce932da

My use case is this component from vue-mdc-adapter
https://github.com/stasson/vue-mdc-adapter/blob/master/components/tabs/mdc-tab.vue

It is using https://github.com/material-components/material-components-web for rendering and I need to trigger foundation.setActive() from mdc when the underlying router-link changes to active


### What does the proposed API look like?
An event on active state change and a data var or computed var for active and exactActive
